thread.title: Real Madrid plan shock squad overhaul: Barcelona and Arsenal target could leave - report
thread.title_full: Real Madrid plan shock squad overhaul: Barcelona and Arsenal target could leave - report

title: Real Madrid plan shock squad overhaul: Barcelona and Arsenal target could leave - report
text:
Getty Images 1 of 38   to see who made UEFA's Best Player in Europe Award shortlist, including the final shortlisted Top 10 GETTY Karim Benzema has endured a difficult season at Real Madrid 
Zidane now faces a fight to land a first league title since Jose Mourinho ruled the roost back in 2012. 
And Spanish outlet Don Balon claim three players could be sold at the end of the season if they continue to struggle. 
Among those is Barcelona and Arsenal target Isco. 
Isco has endured a nightmare season under Zidane and, with his contract expiring next summer, could be offloaded should he continue to struggle. GETTY Real Madrid boss Zinedine Zidane has also grown tired of Danilo 
Karim Benzema’s performances are also said to have concerned Madrid chiefs. 
The France international has scored 12 goals in 26 games but has cut a frustrated figure throughout their recent plight. 
That, coupled with his failure to step up in the absence of Gareth Bale, means a summer move could be on the cards. 
Zidane is also growing tired of defender Danilo, who toiled during their recent Copa del Rey exit to Celta Vigo. 
However, Isco and Benzema’s attitudes are causing the most friction in Spain and they could be off should they fail to raise their game. Related articles
